meanings.definition: Reduce to the smallest possible amount or degree.
meanings.sent1: The company is minimizing its expenses to increase profits.
meanings.sent2: We are minimizing the time spent on unnecessary tasks.
meanings.sent3: The chef playfully claimed he was minimizing the number of ingredients to keep the dish simple.
meanings.sent4: His words had a way of minimizing the impact of the bad news.
meanings.sent5: The artist's brushstrokes were so precise, they seemed to be minimizing the canvas itself.
